content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”ADR Chambers resolves disputes all over the country and around the world, working wherever people have disputes.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:28px|text_align:left|line_height:36px” google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1530104063537{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1509634477254{margin-bottom: 1em !important;}”]

ADR Chambers
Don Valley Parkway and 401

Due to COVID-19  our employees are working remotely.  We highly recommend that you communicate with us via email.
Please contact us at adr@adrchambers.com before you send any parcels or documents to 180 Duncan Mill Road, Toronto, ON.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]180 Duncan Mill Road, 4th Floor
North York, Ontario, M3B 1Z6[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Tel: 416-362-8555
Toll-free: 1-800-856-5154
Fax: 416-362-8825

Email: adr@adrchambers.com
or submit your inquiry online[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_gmaps link=”#E-8_”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1534441979325{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #274354 !important;}”]

Booking a Neutral

To book a neutral or inquire about availability, please call 1‑800‑856‑5154 or submit your inquiry online.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
